nodes.bodyText: Are these method checks necessary? If they are, you can just ignore this.
These method checks are not necessary, they've been there since paper implemented this event. https://github.com/PaperMC/Paper/blob/ver/1.11.2/Spigot-API-Patches/0042-Add-ProjectileCollideEvent.patch
More of a stylistic change, but you can put the check and registration on separate lines? Helps with readability and avoiding long lines 😃

nodes.bodyText: Looks like your IDE reformatted the file. Are you able to revert this change?
I actually formatted it on purpose, is there an issue with that?
Overall, no, but it's a bit out of the scope of this specific PR, so it might be better to do in a separate one.
